open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Message filtering

Multiple stacks are implemented, so nothing is preventing
the imlpementation of message filtering.
Proposed syntax:

    -- do not use filtering function
    receive %target local void

    -- use a function with arity 1 that takes a pointer to a value as its
    -- parameter and returns boolean values if a message matches
    receive %target local foo/1

VM should create a stack for each message and invoke the filtering function on it.
Received message is the one for which true is returned from the filtering function.
